bleeding.title: Severe Bleeding
bleeding._comment: Will manage and add audio later
steps: Make the person sit or lie down
Apply firm pressure using a clean cloth
Do not remove your hand from the wound
Maintain pressure until bleeding slows
doNot: Do not tie the bandage too tightly

burns.title: Burns
burns._comment: Will manage and add audio later
steps: Place the burned area under cool running water
Cool for 10â€“15 minutes
Cover gently with a clean cloth
doNot: Do not apply oil or toothpaste

choking.title: Choking
steps: Lean the person forward
Give 5 back blows
If needed, perform 5 abdominal thrusts (Heimlich maneuver)
doNot: Do not insert fingers or objects into the mouth

fracture.title: Fracture
steps: Do not move the injured limb
Immobilize using a splint or clean cloth
Let the person sit or lie comfortably
redFlags: Bone is visible through the skin
doNot: Do not try to realign the bone
Do not apply pressure directly on the fracture

snake_bite.title: Snake Bite
steps: Keep the person calm and still
Keep the affected area below heart level
Do not apply a tight band
doNot: Do not apply ice or alcohol

electric_shock.title: Electric Shock
steps: Turn off the power source immediately
Ensure power is off before touching the person
Lay the person flat and check breathing
doNot: Do not touch the person while current is on
Do not place the person in water

heat_stroke.title: Heat Stroke
steps: Move the person to a shaded, cool place
Loosen clothing gently
Cool the body using wet cloths or cool water
doNot: Do not force the person to drink water
Do not apply ice packs directly on skin

unconscious.title: Unconsciousness
steps: Place the person in recovery position
Check breathing and pulse
Start CPR if the person is not breathing
doNot: Do not give food or water
